title: Simulation-Based Instructional Design for Solving Interdisciplinary Language Problems

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Course focused on solving complex linguistic problems encountered by field practitioners in real work environments.

Learners enhance interdisciplinary communication skills by collaborating online with experts from other fields in a VR simulation environment.
